# tf.sysconfig.get_compile_flags

Get the compilation flags for custom operators.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/sysconfig/get_compile_flags"><code>tf.compat.v1.sysconfig.get_compile_flags</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/sysconfig/get_compile_flags"><code>tf.compat.v2.sysconfig.get_compile_flags</code></a>


``` python
tf.sysconfig.get_compile_flags()
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Returns:

The compilation flags.
